I installed as ENG language but after i ran game it's in Russian!?

Ohh nvm, you have to select manually from components English language because as default it sets Russian, didn't notice that before. If you choose from installer between En and Ru it just changes installer language not game language, so be sure you choose English from Components before install.
Nvm, had to choose English from components before install.
@surmav what do you mean bec when i installed the game ive chosen EN and english but when i ran the game the text is russian
I have FINALLY found the fix for the game freezing at the Ferris wheel cut scene.
Download the CookedPCConsole.rar  file from
mediafire com/?94nlv99i7me8y8b

I have FINALLY found the fix for the game freezing at the Ferris wheel cut scene.

Solution:

Download the  CookedPCConsole rar  file from the link below:

 mediafire com/?94nlv99i7me8y8b

Extract the files from the .rar file

 Copy/ move the folder  ”CookedPCConsole” to the “DevilGame” folder in the game’s install folder*, when asked if to merge and over-write existing files, click “Yes”

* Default game install path:

32-bit:
C:Program FilesDMC Devil May Cry

64-bit:
C:Program Files (x86)DMC Devil May Cry

4. Start the game and continue playing.

Good luck guys.....:)
